idea:
The company proposes to primarily get involved in the business of development, manufacturing and global supply of pharmaceuticals bulk drugs, drug intermediates, starting materials and speciality chemicals.

The company intends to specialize in process transformation and intensification, wherein hazardous and un-safe process are transformed in to a Flow Chemistry process. besides process transformation, the company adopts various innovative methods to optimize industrial processes using modern and innovative reaction and process equipment.
